name: Hurricane
description: This is a reaction type small game with simple operation, and the movement direction keys can control the movement of characters. The game graphics are simple and fresh, with bright colors, giving people a relaxed and enjoyable feeling. Game operations have a certain degree of challenge, picking up as many fruits as possible within a limited time to avoid being hit by bombs, testing the user's reaction ability and operational skills. The higher the score, the stronger the sense of achievement.
